title: Beef goulash soup (Gulyas leves)
description: This is a main meal soup – a soup for heroes. Yes, we know this is a baking book but you have to cook this to go with the pogacsa, the bacon scones, to make a feast fit for a Magyar warlord or lady! Don’t be scared by the amount of paprika – it works, we promise you.
ingredients: 2 celery sticks, leaves and all, diced
4 potatoes, peeled and chopped into small cubes
soured cream and flat-leaf parsley, to garnish
